statements: UPDATE ARContentMetadata SET ar_content_name = 'New AR Content' WHERE ar_content_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ARContentMetadata SET ar_content_type = 'Image', ar_content_size = 1024 WHERE ar_content_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ARContentMetadata SET ar_content_name = 'New Name', ar_content_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE ar_content_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ARContentMetadata SET ar_content_path = '/new/path/image.jpg', ar_content_size = 2048 WHERE ar_content_id = '9876abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-098765432100';
UPDATE ARContentMetadata SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ARContentImages SET caption = 'Awesome image caption' WHERE image_id = 10;
UPDATE ARContentMetadata SET description = 'New description', title = 'Updated Title' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ARContentImages SET caption = 'Beautiful Image', image_url = 'https://example.com/image1.jpg' WHERE content_id = 2;
UPDATE ARContentMetadata SET content_name = 'Updated Name', content_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ContentTagMapping SET tag_id = 2 WHERE content_id = 3;
UPDATE ARContentMetadata SET content_description='Updated description', content_url='https://example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE ContentTagMapping SET tag_id=2 WHERE mapping_id=3;
UPDATE ar_content_metadata SET author='John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ar_tags SET tag_name='Technology' WHERE tag_id = 1;
UPDATE ar_content_metadata SET author = 'John Doe', hash = 'abc123' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ar_users SET email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE username = 'johndoe';
UPDATE ar_content SET content_name='Updated Content 1', content_description='Description for Updated Content 1' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE ar_tags SET tag_name='New Tag' WHERE tag_id=2;
UPDATE ar_users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE ar_content SET content_description='Updated description', uploaded_date='2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE id = 5;
